permissions.name: Read Blog
permissions.description: Request permission to read blog posts and category data.

params.name: paging.offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

params.name: paging.limit
params.doc: Number of items to return. If not set, defaults to 50.

params.name: fieldsToInclude
params.doc: List of category fields to be included in the response.

docs.summary: Lists up to 100 categories.

permissions.name: Read Blog
permissions.description: Request permission to read blog posts and category data.

params.name: featured
params.doc: Whether to return only featured posts.

params.name: hashtags
params.doc:
Hashtag filter.
 Pass an array of hashtags to return posts with any of the provided hashtags (anywhere in the post content).

params.name: categoryIds
params.doc:
Category filter.
 Pass an array of category IDs to return posts with any of the provided categories.

params.name: tagIds
params.doc:
Tag filter.
 Pass an array of tag IDs to return posts with any of the provided tags.

params.name: sort
params.doc: Sort order by descending view count, ascending or descending publish date, or default to descending by publish date with pinned posts first.

params.name: paging.offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

params.name: paging.limit
params.doc: Number of items to return. If not set, defaults to 50.

params.name: fieldsToInclude
params.doc: List of post fields to be included in the response. Note: `COUNTERS` is deprecated, use `METRICS` instead.

docs.summary: Lists up to 100 published posts.

ret.doc: Get Blog Post Count Stats response

docs.summary:
Retrieves the number of posts per month published within a specified time span, from first day of a month - ignoring days value in period start field.  
 > Note: If `periodStart` value is set to `2018-11-10` and `months` value is set to `1`, the day value is ignored and statistic are returned for one month from `2018-11-01` until `2018-11-30`, and not between `2018-11-10` and `2018-12-10`.

members.name: base
members.doc: The base URL. For premium sites, this will be the domain. For free sites, this would be site URL (e.g mysite.wixsite.com/mysite)

members.name: path
members.doc: The path to that page - e.g /product-page/a-product

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: publicationCount
members.doc: Number of published posts with this tag

members.name: postCount
members.doc: Number of posts with this tag

members.name: translationId
members.doc: ID of the tag translations. All translations of a single tag will share the same `translationId`.

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter object.
 For a detailed list of supported filters, see [Field Support for Filtering and Sorting](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/community/blog/filter-and-sort).

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sorting options. For a list of sortable fields, see [Field Support for Filtering and Sorting](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/community/blog/filter-and-sort).

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc: List of tag fields to be included in the response.

members.name: includeUrl
members.doc: Includes Tag url on TRUE. Default FALSE

members.name: metaData
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: props
members.doc: SEO tag attributes/properties (name, content, rel, href).

members.name: children
members.doc: Tag inner content e.g. `<title> inner content </title>`.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether the tag is a custom tag.

members.name: preventAutoRedirect
members.doc: disable auto creation of 301 redirects on slug changes (enabled by default).

docs.summary:
The SEO schema object contains data about different types of meta tags. It makes sure that the information about your page is presented properly to search engines.
 The search engines use this information for ranking purposes, or to display snippets in the search results.
 This data will override other sources of tags (for example patterns) and will be included in the <head> section of the HTML document, while not being displayed on the page itself.

members.name: nofollow
members.doc: Indicates to search engine crawlers that the link should not be followed

members.name: customData
members.doc: Serialized object, used for custom/external link panel

members.name: anchor
members.doc: Key of linked node in document

members.name: id
members.doc: ID that will be resolved to a URL by a resolver function

docs.summary: relevant only when has thumbnails

body:
{
  "post" : {
    "id" : "c9402bb3-2568-4f4d-9d2c-9b0aabf7f6d2",
    "title" : "Best peppers for peppercorn sauce",
    "excerpt" : "Let's talk about choosing best peppers for amazing peppercorn sauce... #tasty #spices #fine #dining",
    "contentText" : "Let's talk about choosing best peppers for amazing peppercorn sauce... #tasty #spices #fine #dining",
    "firstPublishedDate" : "2021-03-18T11:45:14.164Z",
    "lastPublishedDate" : "2021-03-18T12:42:16.183Z",
    "url" : {
      "base" : "https://tadaso7.wixsite.com/website",
      "path" : "/post/best-peppers-for-peppercorn-sauce"
    },
    "slug" : "best-peppers-for-peppercorn-sauce",
    "featured" : false,
    "pinned" : false,
    "categoryIds" : [ "a68da372-6bfa-412c-ad29-a3f1000ea3f2" ],
    "coverMedia" : {
      "image" : {
        "id" : "b88f2d5da73042e2b86399ab9f21367f.jpg",
        "url" : "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/b88f2d5da73042e2b86399ab9f21367f.jpg",
        "height" : 714,
        "width" : 1000
      },
      "displayed" : true
    },
    "memberId" : "2d24cb8a-adcc-466a-ab59-fa74e0889a37",
    "hashtags" : [ "tasty", "spices", "fine", "dining" ],
    "commentingEnabled" : true,
    "minutesToRead" : 1,
    "tagIds" : [ "edd159e5-603f-4826-a668-8d8cc037ab6d", "f97a485e-e4ae-4905-86f7-aaa9998672fb", "a337e5fb-d9b6-46af-ab34-d2cf71f7aa2b" ],
    "pricingPlans" : [ "59774fbf-7f6c-4604-bb10-b265c07059c0" ],
    "relatedPostIds" : [ "230ef0e7-7951-4229-b3fb-fdadc237a5f2" ],
    "pricingPlanIds" : [ "59774fbf-7f6c-4604-bb10-b265c07059c0" ],
    "language" : "en",
    "metrics" : {
      "comments" : 0,
      "likes" : 0,
      "views" : 0
    }
  }
}

members.name: excerpt
members.doc:
Post excerpt.
 Can be selected by site owner or extracted from the content text's first characters.

members.name: contentText
members.doc: The post content in plain text.

members.name: firstPublishedDate
members.doc: Date the post was first published.

members.name: lastPublishedDate
members.doc: Date the post was last published.

members.name: featured
members.doc: Whether the post is marked as featured. Allows for filtering posts by featured only.

members.name: pinned
members.doc: Whether the post is pinned. Places the post at the top of the post list.

members.name: categoryIds
members.doc: IDs of categories this post belongs to.

members.name: hashtags
members.doc: Hashtags in the post's content text.

members.name: commentingEnabled
members.doc: Whether commenting on the post is enabled.

members.name: heroImage
members.doc: Hero image placed at the top of the blog page.

members.name: tagIds
members.doc: IDs of tags the post is tagged with.

members.name: pricingPlans
members.doc: IDs of the pricing plans. Deprecated on '2020-10-02' please use pricing_plan_ids instead

members.name: relatedPostIds
members.doc: IDs of posts that are related to this post.

members.name: translationId
members.doc: ID of the translations of this post.

members.name: language
members.doc: Language the post is written in.

members.name: excerpt
members.doc:
Post excerpt.
 Can be selected by site owner or extracted from the post's text.

members.name: featured
members.doc: Whether the post is marked as featured.

members.name: categoryIds
members.doc: IDs of categories this post belongs to.

members.name: hashtags
members.doc: Hashtags extracted from the post's content.

members.name: commentingEnabled
members.doc: Whether commenting on the post is enabled.

members.name: heroImage
members.doc: Hero image, as displayed at the top of the blog page.

members.name: tagIds
members.doc: IDs of tags the post is tagged with.

members.name: relatedPostIds
members.doc: IDs of posts that are related to this post.

members.name: translationId
members.doc: ID of the post's translations. Translations of a single post into multiple languages will all share the same `translationId`.

members.name: language
members.doc: Language the post is written in.

members.name: changeOrigin
members.doc: Origin on how the current draft post state was created.

members.name: label
members.doc: Category label. Displayed in the categories menu.

members.name: postCount
members.doc: Number of posts in the category.

members.name: rank
members.doc: Category position in sequence. `-1` if no rank is defined.

members.name: translationId
members.doc: ID of the category's translations. All translations of a single category will share the same `translationId`.

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc: Array of category fields to be included in the response. By default, any `fieldsToInclude` not passed are not returned.

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc: List of category fields to be included in the response.

members.name: metaData
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter object.
 For a detailed list of supported filters, see [Field Support for Filtering and Sorting](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-blog/blog/filter-and-sort).

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sorting options. For a list of sortable fields, see [Field Support for Filtering and Sorting](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-blog/blog/filter-and-sort).

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc: List of category fields to be included in the response.

members.name: metaData
members.doc: // Details on the paged set of results returned.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_npm_communities_platformized_blog_v3_GetCategoryBySlugRequest
messages.displayName: Get Category By Slug Request Object

members.name: slug
members.doc: Slug of the category to retrieve.

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc: List of category fields to be included in the response.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_npm_communities_platformized_blog_v3_GetCategoryBySlugResponse
messages.displayName: Get Category By Slug Response Object

messages.name: _com_wixpress_npm_communities_platformized_blog_v3_UpdateDraftPostContentRequest
messages.displayName: Update Draft Post Content Request Object

messages.name: _com_wixpress_npm_communities_platformized_blog_v3_UpdateDraftPostContentResponse
messages.displayName: Update Draft Post Content Response Object

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc:
Array of post fields to be included in the response. By default, any `fieldsToInclude` not passed are not returned.
 Note: `COUNTERS` is deprecated, use `METRICS` instead.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_npm_communities_platformized_blog_v3_GetPostBySlugRequest
messages.displayName: Get Post By Slug Request Object

members.name: slug
members.doc: Slug of the post to retrieve.

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc: List of post fields to be included in the response. Note: `COUNTERS` is deprecated, use `METRICS` instead.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_npm_communities_platformized_blog_v3_GetPostBySlugResponse
messages.displayName: Get Post By Slug Response Object

members.name: featured
members.doc: Whether to return only featured posts.

members.name: hashtags
members.doc:
Hashtag filter.
 Pass an array of hashtags to return posts with any of the provided hashtags (anywhere in the post content).

members.name: categoryIds
members.doc:
Category filter.
 Pass an array of category IDs to return posts with any of the provided categories.

members.name: tagIds
members.doc:
Tag filter.
 Pass an array of tag IDs to return posts with any of the provided tags.

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort order by descending view count, ascending or descending publish date, or default to descending by publish date with pinned posts first.

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc: List of post fields to be included in the response. Note: `COUNTERS` is deprecated, use `METRICS` instead.

members.name: metaData
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: filter
members.doc:

 For a detailed list of supported filters, see [Field Support for Filtering and Sorting](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-blog/blog/filter-and-sort).

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sorting options. For a list of sortable fields, see [Field Support for Filtering and Sorting](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-blog/blog/filter-and-sort).

members.name: fieldsToInclude
members.doc: List of post fields to be included in the response. Note: `COUNTERS` is deprecated, use `METRICS` instead.

members.name: metaData

messages.name: _com_wixpress_npm_communities_platformized_blog_v3_GetPostCountInfoRequest
messages.displayName: Get Post Count Info Request Object

members.name: postId
members.doc: Returns post counters by post id

messages.name: _com_wixpress_npm_communities_platformized_blog_v3_GetPostCountInfoResponse
messages.displayName: Get Post Count Info Response Object

members.name: postCountInfo
members.doc: Post count info for provided post ID

members.name: initiator
members.doc: Id of a person who liked the post

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID of person who liked a post (returned if the member was logged in when liking the post)

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID if person that liked the post is not logged in

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ADMIN - Changed by admin
  • ADD_CATEGORIES - Categories were changed
  • AUTO_SAVE - Saved automatically
  • COPY_TEMPLATE - Copied from template
  • IMPORT - Imported
  • IMPORT_BULK - Imported in bulk
  • IMPORT_HTML - Imported with html import
  • IMPORT_PATCH - Patch import
  • LANGUAGE_CHANGE - Changed language
  • MANUAL_SAVE - Saved manually
  • MIGRATION - Affected by migration
  • MODERATION - Affected by moderation
  • MOVE_TO_TRASH - Moved to trash
  • PRICING_PLANS_CHANGE - Pricing plans were changed
  • PROVISION - Was provisioned
  • PUBLISH - Was published
  • REASSIGN_OWNER - Owner was reassigned
  • REBLOG - Was reblogged
  • RESTORE - Was restored
  • REVERT_TO_DRAFT - Reverted to draft
  • TRANSLATION - Was translated
  • UNPUBLISH - Was unpublished
  • UNSCHEDULE - Was unscheduled
  • NEW_EDIT_SESSION - New edit session started which updated editing_session_id id
  • SCHEDULING_SERVICE_SCHEDULE - Was scheduled by Later
  • SCHEDULING_SERVICE_UNSCHEDULE - Was unscheduled by Later
  • SCHEDULING_SERVICE_PUBLISH - Was published by Later
  • SCHEDULE - Was scheduled
  • REMOVE_FROM_MODERATION - Was removed from moderation

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • URL - Includes Category url
  • INTERNAL_ID - Includes internal id field

Possible values are:
  • FEED - Sorting by publishing date descending with pinned posts first. The default value
  • PUBLISHED_DATE_ASC - Sorting by publishing date ascending
  • PUBLISHED_DATE_DESC - Sorting by publishing date descending
  • VIEW_COUNT - Sorting by view count descending

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • COUNTERS - Includes Post metrics when present Deprecated use `METRICS` instead
  • URL - Includes Post url when present
  • CONTENT_TEXT - Includes Post content text string when present
  • METRICS - Includes Post metrics when present
  • SEO - Includes SEO data
  • CONTENT - Includes Post content as a stringified DraftJS document (internal only)
  • INTERNAL_ID - Includes internal id field
  • CONTACT_ID - Includes post owners Contact Id
  • RICH_CONTENT - Includes post rich content
